plot: Two business partners based in Los Angeles are involved in a treacherous operation, sweeping hard drugs from deep within Mexico back into the United States. Despite the occupational hazards accompanying the smuggling game, they are rewarded with lucrative gains. When the drug trade heats up the duo finds themselves in a precarious situation like none they've faced before.
title: Narcos
